TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions, class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor
Public Class DynamicField Inherits DataControlField Implements IAttributeAccessor, IFieldFormattingOptions
type DynamicField = class inherit DataControlField interface IAttributeAccessor interface IFieldFormattingOptions

summary.span: 表示在使用 ASP.NET 動態資料功能的資料繫結控制項中顯示的資料欄位。

span.span: Represents a data field that is displayed in a data-bound control that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 類別可供資料繫結控制項，例如和控制項，以顯示使用 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 功能在自訂頁面中的欄位值。The class is used by data-bound controls, such as the and controls, to display a field value that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features in custom pages. 類別會提供類似的功能類別。The class provides functionality that resembles that of the class. 不過，因為動態資料的應用程式中使用物件，您可以利用下列的動態資料功能：However, because a object is used in Dynamic Data applications, you can take advantage of the following Dynamic Data features: - 自動轉譯適當的控制項欄位使用欄位的範本為基礎的資料類型。Automatically rendering the proper control for a field by using field templates, based on the data type. 整個應用程式都可以修改全域的欄位樣板。The field templates can be globally modified for the entire application. - 提供根據資料庫結構描述的內建的資料驗證。Providing built-in data validation based on the database schema. 您也可以加入自訂資料模型的驗證類型。You can also add validation types by customizing the data model. - 使用資料模型中的屬性，或使用自訂個別欄位的資料轉譯屬性。Customizing data rendering for individual fields by using attributes in the data model or by using the property. 物件使用呈現每個欄位`DynamicControl`控制項。The object renders each field by using a `DynamicControl` control. 若要指定要顯示的資料欄位物件、 設定屬性設為欄位名稱。To specify the data field to display in a object, set the property to the field name. 您可以設定來套用自訂格式字串至欄位值屬性。You can apply a custom formatting string to the field value by setting the property. 根據預設格式字串被套用至欄位值，只有在資料繫結控制項處於唯讀模式時。By default the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要將格式字串套用至資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時顯示的值，設定屬性`true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 如果欄位值為`null`，您可以藉由設定顯示自訂標題屬性。If a field value is `null`, you can display a custom caption by setting the property. 物件也會自動將轉換空字串 ("") 藉由設定欄位值為 null 值屬性`true`。The object can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the property to `true`. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 請參閱這項功能的執行階段程式碼範例：[執行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField). 下列範例示範如何使用物件存放至控制項來顯示和編輯資料庫資料表中的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the object in a control to display and edit values from a database table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public DynamicField ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: DynamicField();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要以動態方式加入物件資料繫結控制項，請建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果您使用控制項，加入物件集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，強烈建議的欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 以靜態方式宣告所有欄位可都減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.

.property instance bool ApplyFormatInEditMode
Public Property ApplyFormatInEditMode As Boolean

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示資料欄位處於編輯模式時， 屬性指定的格式化字串是否套用至欄位值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formatted string that is specified by the property is applied to field value when the data field is in edit mode.

value.span: 如果在編輯模式下 套用格式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the applies formatting in edit mode; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項 (例如，和) 可讓使用者讀取、 編輯或將記錄插入的不同的顯示模式。Data-bound controls (such as , and ) have different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert records. 依預設，格式化字串會指定由屬性套用至欄位值只有在資料繫結控制項處於唯讀模式時。By default, the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要將格式字串套用至資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時顯示的值，設定屬性`true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > A物件不會自動移除設定格式化的資料來源中更新的欄位時。A object does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source. 如果您不想格式儲存的值的一部分，您必須移除的格式以程式設計的方式。If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示在資料來源中更新資料欄位時，是否將空字串值 ("") 自動轉換為 null 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.

value.span: 表示將空字串值自動轉換為 null 值，否則為 。

span.span: to automatically convert empty string values to null values; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候使用者可能會為欄位值，更新或插入資料錄時輸入空字串。Sometimes the user might enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用屬性來指定是否為空字串值會自動轉換為 null 的資料來源中更新資料欄位時。Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to null when the data field is updated in the data source. 根據預設，物件顯示 null 值為空字串。By default, a object displays null values as empty strings. 若要顯示不同的值，設定屬性。To display a different value, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 物件的資料來源控制項的父控制項物件繫結至也有一個名為屬性。The object of the data source control that the parent control of object is bound to also has a property named . 這個屬性會執行相同的函式。This property performs the same function. 請確定這兩個屬性會適當地設定。Make sure that both properties are set appropriately.

summary.span: 將目前 物件的屬性複製到指定的 物件。

span.span: Copies the properties of the current object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法來複製目前的內容物件物件傳入`newField`參數。It is used by the method to copy the properties of the current object to the object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.

span.para: 覆寫方法以複製新屬性的衍生類別中所建立的。呼叫基底類別的方法，讓屬性類別也會一併複製。
Override the method to copy the new properties that were created in the derived class. Call the base class's method so that the properties of the class are also copied.

A new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法來建立空白物件。It is used by the method to create an empty object.

span.para: 覆寫方法以傳回衍生類別的新執行個體。請勿呼叫基底類別的方法。
Override the method to return a new instance of the derived class. Do not call the method of the base class.

summary.span: 取得或設定要繫結 物件的資料欄位名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind the object to.

value.span: 物件所繫結的資料欄位名稱。

span.span: The name of the data field that the object is bound to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料欄位繫結至物件。Use the property to specify the data field to bind to the object. 資料欄位可以是資料行名稱，或在外部索引鍵資料行，此關聯性名稱。The data field can be the column name or, for foreign key columns, the relationship name. 根據預設，指定的資料欄位會顯示由物件使用的欄位資料型別相關聯的欄位樣板。By default, the specified data field is displayed by the object using the field template that is associated with the field data type. 您可以變更設定呈現資料欄位的欄位樣板屬性。You can change the field template that is rendered for the data field by setting the property. 您也可以藉由設定格式化顯示的文字屬性。You can also format the displayed text by setting the property. 如果欄位值為`null`，空字串 ("") 會顯示預設值。If a field value is `null`, an empty string ("") is displayed for the value by default. 若要指定替代的標題，請設定屬性。To specify an alternate caption, set the property. **請注意**如果您想要變更全域的顯示和行為的資料欄位，您必須將屬性套用至您的資料模型，而不是將此設定中的特定執行個體物件。**Note** If you want to change the display and behavior of a data field globally, you must apply attributes to your data model instead of setting this in a particular instance of the object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). 呼叫方法來引發狀態變更事件時屬性設定。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DataFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataFormatString
Public Property DataFormatString As String
public: property System::String ^ DataFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，這個字串指定資料欄位值的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.

value.span: 格式化字串，指定資料欄位值的顯示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示該值未套用任何特殊格式。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂的顯示格式的顯示值物件。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values displayed in the object. 如果屬性未設定，將欄位值會顯示不含任何特殊的格式。If the property is not set, the field value is displayed without any special formatting. 根據預設，格式字串套用至該欄位值，其中包含資料繫結控制項時，才物件處於唯讀模式。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the object is in read-only mode. 若要將格式字串套用至欄位值，在編輯模式中，設定屬性`true`。To apply the formatting string to the field value while in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 使用指定的顯示格式屬性是這個執行個體的特定類別。The display format that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the class. 您也可以變更橫跨整個應用程式資料欄位的顯示格式，藉由套用您的資料模型和設定建構函式中的參數名稱。You can also change the display format for a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model and setting the named parameter in the constructor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512).

summary.span: 取得或設定資料繫結控制項 (其中含有 物件) 之標頭中顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header of the data-bound control that contains the object.

value.span: 資料繫結控制項 (其中含有 物件) 之標頭中顯示的文字。

span.span: The text that is displayed in the header of the data-bound control that contains the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來識別資料繫結控制項中的欄位易記名稱。Use the property to identify a field in a data-bound control with a friendly name. 最常見的應用程式的屬性是要提供有意義的資料行名稱中的資料欄位或控制項。The most common application of the property is to provide meaningful column names to data fields in a or control. 根據預設，屬性使用透過設定資料欄位的顯示名稱屬性。By default, the property uses the display name set for the data field by using the attribute. 如果未設定的顯示名稱，屬性使用的值屬性。If the display name is not set, the property uses the value of the property.

exception.span: 物件是一種在資料繫結控制項內的物件，它不會繫結至實作 介面的資料來源控制項。

span.span: The object is inside a data-bound control that is not bound to a data source control that implements the interface.

.property instance bool HtmlEncode
Public Property HtmlEncode As Boolean
public: property bool HtmlEncode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HtmlEncode : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示資料欄位值在 物件中顯示之前是否進行 HTML 編碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in a object.

value.span: 如果欄位值在顯示之前進行 HTML 編碼則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定欄位值是否為 HTML 編碼成其個別的字串表示法顯示之前。Use the property to specify whether field values are HTML-encoded to their respective string representations before they are displayed. > [!NOTE] > HTML 編碼的欄位值可協助防止跨網站指令碼的攻擊和惡意的內容不會再顯示。HTML-encoding field values helps to prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed. 可能的話，應該啟用這個屬性。This property should be enabled whenever possible. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void InitializeCell (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell cell, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType cellType, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState rowState, int rowIndex);

summary.span: 取得或設定資料欄位值為 時該欄位所顯示的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 資料欄位值為 時該欄位所顯示的標題。

span.span: The caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時欄位值會儲存為 null 的資料來源中。Sometimes a field value is stored as null in the data source. 您可以指定自訂設定中有 null 值的資料欄位的顯示標題屬性。You can specify a custom caption to display for data fields that have a null value by setting the property. 如果未設定這個屬性，null 的欄位值顯示為空字串 ("")。If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings ("").

summary.span: 取得動態欄位的唯讀狀態。

span.span: Gets the read-only state of the dynamic field.
The read-only state of the dynamic field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`、控制項載入唯讀範本。If the property is `true`, the control loads a read-only template. 這個屬性需要啟用檢視狀態。This property requires that view state be enabled.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料欄位做為資料來源排序依據時使用的排序運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets the sort expression that is used when the data field is used to sort the data source by.

value.span: 資料欄位做為資料來源排序依據時使用的排序運算式。

span.span: The sort expression that is used when the data field is used to sort the data source by.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性便會嘗試使用的值物件相關聯的資料行屬性物件藉由設定屬性。The property tries to use the value of the property of the column object that is associated with the object by setting the property. 呼叫方法來引發狀態變更事件時屬性設定。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 物件是一種在資料繫結控制項內的物件，它不會繫結至實作 介面的資料來源控制項。

span.span: The object is inside a data-bound control that is not bound to a data source control that implements the interface.

.property instance string UIHint
Public Overridable Property UIHint As String

member this.UIHint : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於顯示資料欄位的欄位樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets the field template to use for displaying the data field.

value.span: 要用於顯示資料欄位的欄位樣板名稱。

span.span: The name of the field template to use for displaying the data field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要用來顯示資料欄位的使用者介面的欄位樣板。Use the property to specify the field template to use to display the UI for a data field. 預設的欄位樣板是使用者控制項，而且其名稱包含識別欄位的範本，可用於編輯作業和插入作業的後置詞。Field templates by default are user controls and their names contain a suffix to identify field templates that are used for edit operations and insert operations. 尾碼會分別為 （_e） 和 （_i）。The suffixes are _edit and _insert, respectively. 當您將值設屬性，將不含網域的尾碼的名稱。When you set a value to the property, you set the name without the suffixes. 動態資料會識別目前的資料欄位的模式，然後將會呈現正確的欄位樣板。Dynamic Data will identify the current mode of the data field and will render the correct field template. 如果屬性未設定、 動態的資料依預設會轉譯根據欄位類型的欄位樣板。If the property is not set, Dynamic Data by default will render the field template based on the field type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 動態資料 Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12). 使用指定的欄位樣板屬性是這個執行個體的特定類別。The field template that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the class. 您也可以變更使用橫跨整個應用程式藉由套用資料欄位的欄位樣板資料模型。You can also change the field template used by a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model. 設定屬性會覆寫套用至資料模型的中繼資料。Setting the property overrides the metadata applied to the data model. 如需中繼資料屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information about metadata attributes, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). 呼叫方法來引發狀態變更事件時屬性設定。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state.
